test.name: User can open homepage

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'firefox' to base url 'https://swaychat.com/ chrome'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
WebDriverException: Message: 'geckodriver' executable needs to be in PATH.

test.doc: User should be able to open the homepage and view the tagline
test.status: WebDriverException: Message: 'geckodriver' executable needs to be in PATH.
